name: Hemoglobin 2.5-bit
description:
HEMOGLOBIN 2.5-bit

Hoot-hoot! 

Hemoglobin is a simple platformer which I used to prototype and to learn the Construct engine. You have to collect all rubies and diamonds. The collected rubies can be used as an ammunition against the enemies. Those can be dispatched by jumping on their heads Mario-style. 

Have mercy on me. 

Controls: 

Movement and Jump: Arrow Keys

Double jump: Up, Up

Shoot: Space 

First level available. 
All assets used are royalty free or own.
